label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_008
content:
## 2024-04-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 105
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 12
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 2

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 25
- Mid Dose: 27
- High Dose: 26
- Placebo: 29

### Immunogenicity By Group
#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 45.6
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.8
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 74.3
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 121.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 82.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 16.1

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 83.3
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 33.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 120.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 191.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 130.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 36.0

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 106.0
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.8
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 176.1
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 257.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 180.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 45.0

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.9
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 3.4
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 10.9
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 21.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 17.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 7.7

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 47.4
- Erythema Percentage: 19.4
- Swelling Percentage: 14.5
- Induration Percentage: 8.8
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 17.7

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 15.2
- Fatigue Percentage: 31.9
- Myalgia Percentage: 19.0
- Headache Percentage: 26.4
- Chills Percentage: 5.3

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.2
- WBC (K) SD: 1.8
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 26.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.8
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 52.9
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.9
- Platelets (K) Mean: 219
- Platelets (K) SD: 39
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 2.0
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.4

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0818, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0817, Description: malaise, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- Reactogenicity diary card collection rate: 95%
- Vaccine lot VX-645 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range

### Notes
- Week 8: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 107 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
